programme.title: The Yorkshire Vet
programme.desc: Julian Norton heads to a local farm to de-horn some young bullocks, and helps colleague Peter Wright when a dog needs emergency surgery to remove a bone wedged in its oesophagus. Peter also has to deal with a ferret who has a suspicious lump that could be cancerous, and meets Skeldale family the Greens, who are concerned about their rescue donkey.(n)

programme.title: 5 News Lunchtime
programme.desc: Round-up of the day's headlines from around the world.(n)

programme.title: Celebrity Big Brother
programme.desc: Highlights of the new housemates' first full day in the Big Brother house. The celebrities may be used to staring down a lens as part of their working lives, but Big Brother's 24-hour spy-like devices are not the TV, movie and paparazzi cameras they are used to facing. It remains to be seen who is playing up for the benefit of the viewing public and who is taking a more laid-back approach to their public incarceration.(n)

programme.title: Access
programme.desc: Showbiz news and gossip.(n)

programme.title: Home and Away
programme.desc: Hunter breaks down after a confrontation with Mason and admits he is torn over whether to look for his biological father. Scarlett apologises to Justin for her recent behaviour.(n)

programme.title: Neighbours
programme.desc: Willow wrestles with whether to trial living with Fergus and his family. The Liveability campaign suffers a blow, while Steph's state of health takes an alarming turn.(n)

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: Assistant coroner Palmer is called to the building site on a Navy base where a body has been found. While looking into the incident, he spots an armed man fleeing the scene with the victim's passport and is almost killed as he gives chase. It appears the document was stolen to hinder the investigation, but the discovery of a second corpse reveals a case of stolen identity and a compensation racket.(n)

programme.title: Jesse Stone: Stone Cold
programme.desc: A sleepy backwater town's hard-drinking chief of police is roused from his dull routine when he finds himself having to solve two cases at once - a spate of seemingly random murders and the rape of a teenage girl whose parents may have something to hide. Detective drama based on the novel by Robert B Parker, starring Tom Selleck and Mimi Rogers.(n)

programme.title: 5 News at 5
programme.desc: Round-up of the day's headlines from around the world.(n)

programme.title: Neighbours
programme.desc: Willow wrestles with whether to trial living with Fergus and his family. The Liveability campaign suffers a blow, while Steph's state of health takes an alarming turn.(n)

programme.title: Home and Away
programme.desc: Hunter breaks down after a confrontation with Mason and admits he is torn over whether to look for his biological father. Scarlett apologises to Justin for her recent behaviour.(n)

programme.title: 5 News Tonight
programme.desc: A round-up of the evening's headlines, including coverage of the latest national and international stories.(n)

programme.title: Cricket on 5
programme.sub-title: England v South Africa: Fourth Test Day One.
programme.desc: England v South Africa. Highlights of the opening day's play in the final Test of the four-match series, which took place at Old Trafford in Manchester.(n)

programme.title: Make You Laugh Out Loud
programme.desc: Iain Lee narrates a compilation of clips of young hounds doing the cutest and funniest things. Plus, a look behind the scenes at the internet's best canine supervirals. Contribitors include Dave Spikey, Zoe Lyons and Des Clarke.(n)

programme.title: Celebrity Big Brother
programme.desc: A chance to catch up with the latest events inside the house as the celebrities cope with living under constant surveillance, with all the arguments and alliances, as well as the revelations in the diary room.(n)

programme.title: Autopsy
programme.desc: In April 1994, 27-year-old musician and Nirvana frontman Kurt Cobain was found dead at his Seattle mansion with a gunshot wound to his head. A suicide note was found at the scene and police quickly concluded that Kurt had taken his own life. In the years since controversy has raged over the nature of his death, with many claiming he had too much heroin in his system to have shot himself. Here, forensic pathologist Dr Jason Payne-James examines all the available medical evidence and with testimony from family and friends, finally hopes to reveal the real cause of Kurt Cobain's death.(n)

programme.title: Celebrity Big Brother's Bit on the Side
programme.desc: Rylan Clark-Neal presents the CBB companion show, including celebrity guests' thoughts on the latest developments and behind-the-scenes insights.(n)

programme.title: SuperCasino
programme.desc: Viewers get the chance to take part in live interactive gaming, with an entertaining mix of roulette-wheel spins and lively chat from the presenting team. Featuring a variety of prizes and promotions.(n)

programme.title: Celebrity Big Brother
programme.desc: A chance to catch up with the latest events inside the house as the celebrities cope with living under constant surveillance, with all the arguments and alliances, as well as the revelations in the diary room.(n)

programme.title: Caught on Camera
programme.desc: Journalist Nick Wallis joins police forces around the nation to discover how CCTV and technological advances are helping to bring criminals to justice. The programme reveals how essential surveillance cameras have become in the fight against crime and features footage of people caught red-handed.(n)

programme.title: Access
programme.desc: Showbiz news and gossip.(n)

programme.title: House Doctor
programme.desc: Property guru Ann Maurice tackles a bungalow that won't sell in Hove. Thanks to a lurid colour scheme, it is scaring would-be buyers away.(n)

programme.title: Divine Designs
programme.desc: Paul Binski examines pre-Reformation approaches to moral instruction, contrasting the humorous stone gargoyles of St Andrew's Church in Heckington, Lincolnshire, with the stark and sombre stained-glass windows found at St Mary's in the Gloucestershire town of Fairford.(n)

programme.title: Wildlife SOS
programme.desc: The work of volunteers treating sick, injured and orphaned animals at a wildlife sanctuary.(n)

programme.title: Poppy Cat
programme.desc: Alma offers to knit jumpers for her friends, but she has run out of wool, meaning the gang must first find some using their hot-air balloon.(n)

programme.title: Little Princess
programme.desc: The young royal is annoyed she is not allowed on her new swing unless an adult is around to supervise.(n)

programme.title: The Mr Men Show
programme.desc: Little Miss Whoops causes havoc on board the Dillydale Express.(n)

programme.title: Milkshake! Monkey
programme.desc: The inquisitive animal discovers what interesting creatures live underwater and wonders what it would be like to be a monkey fish.(n)

programme.title: Milkshake! Bopping About
programme.desc: Music and movement for youngsters. David and Jen enjoy a dance as they sing a camping song to help them put up some imaginary tents.(n)

programme.title: Simon
programme.desc: Children's animation about a young rabbit. Simon is playing at being a superhero when a real-life rescue mission suddenly beckons.(n)

programme.title: Peppa Pig
programme.desc: Suzy and Peppa decide to work in a shop to be more like adults, but discover it is very tiring.(n)

programme.title: Wissper
programme.desc: Beavers Ed and Ted are unable to agree on the final part of their new dam, so Wissper calls in Kev the crocodile to help her find a solution.(n)

programme.title: Paw Patrol
programme.desc: With the other pups at parachute training, Marshall must get a group of lost kittens back by himself, but he has the help of the other pups? packs.(n)

programme.title: Bob the Builder
programme.desc: Bob and the team install a satellite dish at Spring City News HQ, but Leo starts to make mistakes after being distracted by a game on his phone.(n)

programme.title: Fireman Sam
programme.desc: There is a rehearsal for the grand opening for the new ocean rescue centre, but Mike sets off fireworks by accident and the platform bursts into flames.(n)

programme.title: Olly the Little White Van
programme.desc: Farmer Dan is given the chance to get behind the wheel of a hi-tech tractor, leaving Jethro feeling sad and useless.(n)

programme.title: Olly the Little White Van
programme.desc: Stan enters a golf tournament against a competitive businessman, but Olly is on hand to help him avoid getting too nervous.(n)

programme.title: Paw Patrol
programme.desc: The team comes to the aid of a family of deer that is stick on the ice.(n)

programme.title: Blaze and the Monster Machines
programme.desc: A `light thief' leaves all of the residents of Axle City in the dark, so Gabby outfits Blaze with special gear to help track down the burglar and illuminate the situation.(n)

programme.title: Noddy: Toyland Detective
programme.sub-title: Noddy and the Case of the Dazzle Dragon.
programme.desc: The sleuth investigates when there are signs that a dragon has come to live in Fable Forest for the first time.(n)

programme.title: Floogals
programme.desc: Animation about three tiny aliens investigating planet Earth. Flo's fizzer gets stuck to a magnet in Luke's backpack as he is about to leave for school.(n)

programme.title: Ben and Holly's Little Kingdom
programme.desc: The duo grow to human size when a spell goes wrong, allowing them to play with Lucy and her friends.(n)

programme.title: Shimmer and Shine
programme.desc: When the girls bake magical flying cookies, Zeta and Nazboo sneak into their palace to steal the flying flour.(n)

programme.title: Digby Dragon
programme.desc: Animation following the adventures of a dragon and his best friends. Digby feels down on Dragon Day as he cannot yet fly or breathe fire.(n)

programme.title: Peppa Pig
programme.desc: The piglet and her family spot a rainbow while out driving.(n)

programme.title: Peppa Pig
programme.desc: Pedro gets a cough at play school, and the other children soon catch the virus.(n)

programme.title: Ben and Holly's Little Kingdom
programme.desc: Daisy and Poppy are given a powerful magic wand by Granny Thistle when she comes to stay, and have fun with it when they escape from the castle.(n)

programme.title: Wanda and the Alien
programme.desc: Wanda and Alien go on an adventure to find the end of a rainbow. Fun for younger viewers about a rabbit who is best friends with an extraterrestrial.(n)

programme.title: Chinese Food in Minutes
programme.desc: Two gospel singers learn how to cook up a feast for their choir. Ching-He Huang teaches them recipes for chicken and black bean stir-fry, and sweet and sour ribs.(n)

programme.title: Make You Laugh Out Loud
programme.sub-title: Dogs Make You Laugh Out Loud.

programme.title: Police Interceptors
programme.desc: Damien Stevens draws his stun gun on an aggressive driver, while the hunt for a suspected armed robber turns up a nasty surprise for dog handler Jimmy Grieves. Paul Jackson grapples with a man armed with a machete, and officers get kitted up to raid the home of a suspected cannabis grower.(n)

programme.title: Police Interceptors
programme.desc: The series exploring the work of the North-East's high-speed police interception unit continues as Damo Stevens hunts down a heroin dealer, and Jacko rushes to a critical car crash. The interceptors are also called to investigate some potentially hazardous goods, and Kev makes an intriguing discovery in an airing cupboard. Plus, a young driver makes a mistake she may come to regret.(n)

programme.title: Bargain-Loving Brits in the Sun
programme.desc: Drag artist James - aka Dusty Crack - wants to update his Amy Winehouse outfit, but money is tight as he has seen his earnings go down from 100 euros a gig to sometimes as little as 30. Paul and Jacqui run a bar that charges significantly more than other local establishments, but attract customers by offering bingo, quiz nights and British food, while retired Middlesbrough couple Eddie and Pauline are living on a strict budget at Villamar, Benidorm's largest campsite, where they regard their pitch opposite the campsite bins as a bonus.(n)

programme.title: Bargain-Loving Brits in the Sun
programme.desc: Featuring a `Top Ten Guide to Living in Benidorm on the Cheap', revealing that life as a budget expat is possible for almost any pocket, before catching up with some of the big characters from the season. Scouse singer Eddie, Essex campsite worker Dean and Wigan granny Maria explain where to find super-cheap digs, and how to turn a caravan into a home with all mod cons.(n)

programme.title: The Nightmare Neighbour Next Door
programme.desc: A dispute between households arising from investments made into a business venture that later failed, and the fury surrounding the construction of an extension that saw damage to an adjacent property. Plus, updates on people and stories featured in previous programmes, including the latest whereabouts of rowdy rapper Elvis Turasinze, who drove his neighbours berserk with his beat-making.(n)

programme.title: The Nightmare Neighbour Next Door
programme.desc: A dispute involving a female student and the man living upstairs descends into violence, while Doug and Mavis moved into a new house with their menagerie of animals and were stunned when a neighbour complained about the noise, but that turned out to be just the beginning of their troubles.(n)

programme.title: Can't Pay? We'll Take It Away
programme.desc: Kevin Stokes and Brian O'Shaughnessy get into a doorstep confrontation with a debtor who wants to prove her family business is bankrupt. However, when tempers flare Brian is assaulted and the agents call the police. Elsewhere, Paul Bohill and Steve Pinner face evicting three properties owned by the same landlord in north London, and Brian and Delroy Anglin collect £2,000 debt owed to a vet in Kent.(n)

programme.title: Can't Pay? We'll Take It Away
programme.desc: Agents Paul Bohill and Steve Pinner get caught up in a dispute between a landlord and a tenant who refuses to move out, and Brian O'Shaughnessy and Delroy Anglin chase a £17,000 debt. Meanwhile, in Essex, a couple owe their neighbour £11,000, and on the south coast, debt collection from a Turkish restaurant gets complicated when there is confusion about ownership.(n)

programme.title: Cricket on 5
programme.sub-title: England v South Africa: Fourth Test Day Two.
programme.desc: England v South Africa. Highlights of the second day's play in the final Test of the four-match series, which took place at Old Trafford in Manchester.(n)

programme.title: Can't Pay? We'll Take It Away
programme.desc: Documentary giving an insight into cash-strapped Britain from the perspectives of debtors, creditors and those who collect the payments, including High Court enforcement bailiffs and repossession teams. The series follows each case as it unfolds, recording the thoughts and feelings on both sides, the process of repossession and the impact it has on all involved.(n)

programme.title: 5 News Weekend
programme.desc: Round-up of the day's headlines from around the world.(n)

programme.title: Football on 5: The Championship
programme.desc: Highlights from the latest games in the Championship, which included Sunderland v Derby County at The Stadium of Light, Wolverhampton Wanderers v Middlesbrough at Molineux, and Aston Villa v Hull City at Villa Park.(n)

programme.title: Football on 5: Goal Rush
programme.desc: Goals from the weekend's games in Leagues One and Two, which included Southend United v Blackburn Rovers at Roots Hall, Portsmouth v Rochdale at Fratton Park, and Forest Green Rovers v Barnet at The New Lawn.(n)

programme.title: Celebrity Big Brother
programme.desc: Highlights of the residents' past 24 hours under the all-seeing eye of Big Brother, as they try to get used to their housemates' quirks and foibles while also coping with the day-to-day complications of life inside the house.(n)

programme.title: Lip Sync Battle UK
programme.sub-title: Lip Sync Battle UK: Walliams v Dixon.
programme.desc: David Walliams and Alesha Dixon take part in the first edition of this musical game show in which celebrities go head to head lip-synching to a hit song - complete with dance moves, facial expressions and costumes. Presented by former Spice Girl Melanie Brown and her co-host, rapper Professor Green.(n)

programme.title: Waterworld
programme.desc: The Mariner (Kevin Costner) tries to rescue Enola (Tina Majorino) after she's captured by Deacon (Dennis Hopper)(n)

programme.title: The Flight of the Phoenix
programme.desc: Robert Aldrich's tense and exciting thriller about air crash survivors who are finally forced to try and build a single-engine aircraft from the wreckage of their plane in order to escape from their crash-site in the north African desert(n)

programme.title: Ugly
programme.desc: A smart but lonely outsider looks for love in the wrong place. A finalist in the Short Film Competition at the 2016 American Black Film Festival(n)

programme.title: The Maze Runner: The Scorch Trials
programme.desc: Thomas, Teresa, and the rest of the Gladers prepare for phase two of their maze trials after narrowly escaping the first test in this young-adult dystopian sequel(n)

programme.title: The Ninth Gate
programme.desc: Eerie saga about a rare-book buyer who becomes a target of unknown forces when he's asked to find a volume about the Devil(n)

programme.title: Ouija: Origin of Evil
programme.desc: In this horror sequel, a game of Ouija leads to supernatural activity. The youngest daughter of a widow is possessed by an evil spirit as the family goes through hell to try desperately to save her(n)

programme.title: Cast Away
programme.desc: An exploration of human survival and the ability of fate to alter even the tidiest of lives with one major event, Cast Away tells the story of Chuck Noland (Tom Hanks), a Federal Express engineer who devotes most of his life to his troubleshooting job. His girlfriend Kelly (Helen Hunt) is often neglected by his dedication to work, and his compulsive personality suggests a conflicted man. But on Christmas Eve, Chuck proposes marriage to Kelly right before embarking on a large assignment. On the assignment, a plane crash strands Chuck on a remote island, and his fast-paced life is slowed to a crawl, as he is miles removed from any human contact. Finding solace only in a volleyball that he befriends, Chuck must now learn to endure the emotional and physical stress of his new life, unsure of when he may return to the civilization he knew before. Cast Away reunites star Hanks with director Robert Zemeckis, their first film together since 1994's Oscar-winning Forrest Gump(n)

programme.title: Road to Perdition
programme.desc: A betrayed mob hit man goes the lam with his son, and seeks revenge against vicious gangsters. As the bullets start to fly, the impressionable child is exposed to the goriest aspects of his father's talents in this gorgeously stylized action thriller(n)

programme.title: The Green Mile
programme.desc: Set in the Depression of the '30s in southern United States, this drama portrays the remarkable relationship established between Paul Edgecomb (Tom Hanks), a prison guard on Death Row, and John Coffey (Michael Clarke Duncan), a hefty colored man sentenced to death for a brutal double homicide. As the days go by, and after some surprising experiences, Edgecomb begins to have doubts about Coffey's culpability. He is a naïve, apprehensive man with a supernatural gift. Based on a novel by Stephen King, this drama received four Oscar nominations(n)

programme.title: Incarnate
programme.desc: An unconventional exorcist must use his psychic abilities to do battle with a malevolent demon that has taken over an innocent 11-year-old boy. Later, he learns that the paranormal entity is also responsible for the deaths of his wife and child(n)

programme.title: Master Of The Drunken Fist: Beggar So
Warcraft
programme.desc: Humans and orcs clash in this film adaptation of the popular video-game series(n)

programme.title: Right at Your Door
programme.desc: Doomsday comes to LA in this gripping tale of terror, panic and paranoia. When dirty bombs are detonated over Southern California, a husband (Rory Cochrane) and his wife (Mary McCormack) become quarantined, he inside their house, she outside. As contaminated ash rains down from the sky, chaos reigns across the area as those left out in the open run the risk of being poisoned by the fatal toxins. The film is the directorial debut of production designer Chris Gorak, who also wrote the script(n)

programme.title: See No Evil
programme.desc: World Wrestling Entertainment superstar Kane gives a killer performance as a deranged, hulking psychopath who terrorizes eight teens working to rehab a decrepit hotel. It's no-holds-barred mayhem as the murderer employs a variety of different weapons and instruments to dispatch his victims. Directed by Gregory Dark. WWE head Vince McMahon serves as executive producer. Steven Vidler, Christina Vidal, Michael J. Pagan, Samantha Noble, Cecily Polson, Luke Pegler, Penny McNamee, Craig Horner(n)

programme.title: Fierce People
programme.desc: Bittersweet and poignant coming-of-age tale features an exceptional star turn by Anton Yelchin as an underprivileged teen who spends an enlightening summer at the estate of a well-to-do family, where he ingratiates himself with the affluent locals and is mentored by the clan paterfamilias (Donald Sutherland). Diane Lane. Directed by Griffin Dunne. The screenplay was written by Dirk Wittenborn, who adapted his novel. Kristen Stewart, Chris Evans, Elizabeth Perkins, Blu Mankuma, Christopher Shyer(n)

programme.title: Crossroads
programme.desc: Four years after they left school, three old pals team up for a road trip from Georgia to California. Mimi's got dreams of Hollywood, Kit's looking forward to seeing her beau, but Lucy wants escape...and maybe to find the mother she's never met(n)

programme.title: Undercover Brother
programme.desc: Eddie Griffin scores as a hip secret agent in this hilarious spoof of blaxploitation flicks, directed by Malcolm D. Lee. Griffin's character works for a black spy organization that's battling "The Man" and his efforts to suppress black culture. Denise Richards costars as White She-Devil. Chris Kattan, Dave Chappelle(n)

programme.title: Johnson Family Vacation
programme.desc: Comedian Cedric the Entertainer serves as both producer and star of this comedy about a family who discovers just how much can go wrong en route to a family get-together. When Nate Johnson (Cedric the Entertainer) is invited to a big family reunion in Missouri, he sees it as an opportunity to reconnect with his estranged wife and growing children, as well as a chance to show up his wealthier know-it-all brother, Mack (Steve Harvey). Nate takes delivery on an expensive new SUV, persuades his recently separated wife, Dorothy (Vanessa L. Williams), to tag along, and packs up his three kids -- nubile teenager Nikki (Solange Knowles), under-age wannabe rapper D.J. (Bow Wow), and precocious seven-year-old Destiny (Gabby Soleil) -- for what he imagines will be a leisurely drive from Los Angeles to St. Louis. However, between his wary wife, arguing kids, angry police officers, bizarre hitchhikers, bad diner food, and an unfortunate run-in with a cement mixer, getting from point A to point B proves to be just short of a nightmare. Johnson Family Vacation was the first feature film for director Christopher Erskin, who previously distinguished himself directing music videos for the likes of Missy Elliot, TLC, and Boyz II Men(n)

programme.title: Puerto Ricans in Paris
programme.desc: In this hilarious fish-out-of-water comedy, two Puerto Rican NYC cops are asked by a pair of French fashion designers to come to Paris to hunt down the counterfeiters who stole a couture handbag(n)

programme.title: Risky Business
programme.desc: A Chicago teenager is looking for fun at home while his parents are away, but the situation quickly gets out of hand(n)

programme.title: National Security
programme.desc: Two mismatched security guards are thrown together to bust a smuggling operation(n)

programme.title: My Cousin Vinny
programme.desc: When his young cousin is inadvertently charged with murder in an Alabama town, an untested Brooklyn lawyer takes on his first case as he attempts to defend two penniless youths in the heart of Dixie, where he clearly does not understand the protocols of the courtroom...or the South(n)

programme.title: Ted 2
programme.desc: With the help of his best friend John, a sentient teddy bear named Ted fights to be legally recognized as a human so he can have a child with his new wife Tami-Lynn. This gut-busting comedy is a sequel to the 2012 surprise hit(n)

programme.title: Rock Star
programme.desc: Drama about a wannabe rock star who works by day as a copy machine repairman and by night as the lead singer of Blood Pollution, a Pennsylvania tribute band that imitates the heavy metal rockers Steel Dragon. He is devastated when his friends kick him out of the group he founded, but things begin to look up when he is tipped to replace the lead singer of his heavy metal idols. Based on the true story of rock band Judas Priest(n)

programme.title: Three Kings
programme.desc: As the end of the first Gulf War nears, a group of adventurous American soldiers attempt to find a huge cache of hidden Iraqi gold. Action(n)

programme.title: Incarnate
programme.desc: An unconventional exorcist must use his psychic abilities to do battle with a malevolent demon that has taken over an innocent 11-year-old boy. Later, he learns that the paranormal entity is also responsible for the deaths of his wife and child(n)

programme.title: The Mummy Returns
programme.desc: Adventurer Rick O'Connell and his new wife Evelyn return to battle the nefarious undead Imhotep and his beautiful but ruthless sidekick, who have kidnapped their son and taken him to Egypt. However, neither party is expecting to come face to face with another seemingly invincible evil force(n)

programme.title: Waterworld
programme.desc: The Mariner (Kevin Costner) tries to rescue Enola (Tina Majorino) after she's captured by Deacon (Dennis Hopper)(n)

programme.title: The Flight of the Phoenix
programme.desc: Robert Aldrich's tense and exciting thriller about air crash survivors who are finally forced to try and build a single-engine aircraft from the wreckage of their plane in order to escape from their crash-site in the north African desert(n)

Fifteen years later, he's had enough of the jokes and jibes and out bursts Hank, a bad cop character who will bust anyone for anything. programme.title: Knocked Up
programme.desc: When a one-night stand that should have stayed that way has unexpected consequences, the reluctant odd couple attempts to transform their tentative relationship into a lasting love in this conception comedy. Twenty-four-year-old entertainment journalist Alison Scott (Katherine Heigl) is on the fast track to the big time, but an alcohol-fueled hookup with responsibility-shirking slacker Ben Stone (Seth Rogen) finds her professional priorities taking a back seat to having a baby. Now, as overgrown kid Ben attempts to assume the responsibilities of fatherhood, he makes the brave decision to stand by Alison. In order to make things work between the pair, however, there's going to have to be some compromise, and when Alison and Ben decide to take a shot at love, they quickly find that building a relationship from scratch isn't nearly as easy as making a baby(n)

programme.title: Wedding Crashers
programme.desc: In the art of crashing weddings, John Beckwith (Owen Wilson) and Jeremy Grey (Vince Vaughn) are Washington D.C.'s undisputed masters. Guided by their intricate wedding-crashing rules, each week they charm their way into a different wedding -- and romance a different woman to boot. But when they crash the biggest wedding of the year, the ultimate crashers soon find themselves in over their heads as they become hilariously entangled in the eccentricity of the influential political family hosting the event. Christopher Walken, Jane Seymour, Rachel McAdams, Isla Fisher, and Bradley Cooper round up a cast with impressive star wattage and impeccable comedic timing(n)

programme.desc: Sheldon receives a nasty surprise when he visits his mother in Houston, while Raj's murder mystery party causes conflict for the rest of the gang members. Comedy, starring Johnny Galecki, Jim Parsons and Kaley Cuoco.(n)

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: Raj is racked with guilt when he tries to date Lucy and Emily at the same time, Penny has trouble deciding whether to take a role in a film, and Sheldon struggles to choose between two gaming systems. Comedy, starring Kunal Nayyar, Jim Parsons and Kaley Cuoco.(n)

programme.title: This Is 40
programme.desc: A couple wrestle with a series of crises as their 40th birthdays loom on the horizon, turning to friends and family for help in coping with the challenges of work, parenthood, age and debt. Comedy, starring Paul Rudd and Leslie Mann reprising their roles from Knocked Up. With Megan Fox, Albert Brooks and John Lithgow.(n)

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: Sheldon is distraught when his online gaming account is hacked, so his friends decide to find out who is responsible. However, they make the disastrous mistake of confronting the culprit in person. Comedy, starring Johnny Galecki, Jim Parsons and Kaley Cuoco.(n)

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: Amy and Sheldon start a gossip experiment to see how quickly rumours spread among the gang, while Howard tells his friends he is planning to propose to Bernadette - not realising Raj is wrestling with his own feelings for her. Comedy, starring Jim Parsons, Mayim Bialik and Johnny Galecki.(n)

programme.title: Gogglebox
programme.desc: Novel TV review programme in which some of Britain's most opinionated and avid viewers comment on various shows, including Strictly Come Dancing, My Tattoo Addiction, The Midwives and Downton Abbey. Narrated by Caroline Aherne. First shown in 2013.(n)

programme.title: Tattoo Fixers on Holiday
programme.desc: Alice helps Jack rid himself of a tattoo that reminds him of a romance he'd rather forget, Glen licks Gabriela's tatt into shape and Sketch covers Eileen's saucy self-portrait. Kurt gets divorced from his mysterious marriage inking, Frazer covers his cheesy chat-up line and Aimee obtains an awesome original.(n)

programme.title: Rude Tube
programme.desc: Alex Zane presents a top 50 of clips featuring some genius animal singing mash-ups, the `mole whisperer', a double dose of sharks and an unusual delivery of tropical fish.(n)

programme.title: First Dates
programme.desc: Interactive documentary in which singletons meet up with possible partners from the internet for the first time. The latest participants include a 20-year-old glamour model, a 28-year-old financial head-hunter and a 27-year-old man who has been single for several years. At the end of their restaurant meal, the couples decide whether they want to take things further, and if the answer is no, the next date sitting opposite them could be a viewer.(n)

programme.title: How I Met Your Mother
programme.desc: The friends miss the Super Bowl to attend a barman's funeral, and make a pact not to find out the score until the next day. However, adhering to the agreement proves difficult with people all around them discussing the game. Starring Josh Radnor and Alyson Hannigan.(n)

programme.title: How I Met Your Mother
programme.desc: Ted misses his flight to Chicago for a job interview at a prestigious architecture company, so he and Robin retrace their steps to determine who is to blame. Starring Josh Radnor and Alyson Hannigan.(n)

programme.title: The Goldbergs
programme.desc: First episode of the comedy, focusing on an 11-year-old boy as he captures his family on video camera during the 1980s. Barry wants to start driving on his 16th birthday, but Beverly advises against it and refuses to allow Pops to sell him his old car. Starring Jeff Garlin, Troy Gentile and Wendi McLendon-Covey.(n)

programme.title: The Goldbergs
programme.desc: A day at the roller-skating rink leaves Murray wishing he had not asked Erica to tell him about her life, while Pops steps in to help when a back-to-school shopping trip causes problems between Beverly and Adam. Comedy, starring Jeff Garlin, Wendi McLendon-Covey and Hayley Orrantia.(n)

programme.title: The Goldbergs
programme.desc: Barry needs the money to buy an expensive new pair of basketball trainers, so Murray hires him to work at his furniture shop. Beverly refuses to let Adam see a new horror film, but he goes behind her back and tricks Pops into taking him to the cinema. Comedy, starring Wendi McLendon-Covey and Jeff Garlin.(n)

programme.title: The Goldbergs
programme.desc: Erica and Barry wonder how they will appear in the school yearbook. Comedy, starring Wendi McLendon-Covey and Jeff Garlin.(n)

programme.title: The Goldbergs
programme.desc: Erica cannot wait to get out of the house as Graduation Day approaches - until it dawns on her how much her mother's affection means to her. Barry's plans for a summer with Lainey turn to dust, while Dana makes an unexpected visit. Comedy, starring Wendi McLendon-Covey and Hayley Orrantia.(n)

programme.title: Made in Chelsea: Ibiza
programme.desc: The gang heads off to the Spanish island for the summer, with a newly single Sam looking for fun and Victoria encouraging Mark Francis to find his spiritual side.(n)

programme.title: Binky & JP's Baby: Born in Chelsea
programme.desc: Part two of two. Binky and JP bring their daughter home and introduce her to family and friends, before the couple struggle with sleepless nights and dirty nappies.(n)

programme.title: Coach Trip
programme.desc: The tourists take part in beachside yoga in Genoa, followed by a penalty shoot-out, but a row at breakfast dominates the day and causes more upset at the vote.(n)

programme.title: Coach Trip
programme.desc: The group goes kayaking on the Italian Riviera, before some of the new team members are immediately put in the firing line at the vote.(n)

programme.title: Coach Trip
programme.desc: Brendan's budget goes into overdrive as the group races Italian sports cars, before they let off steam playing bubble football.(n)

programme.title: Coach Trip
programme.desc: The tourists reach Bologna, which means a Bolognese cookery class is in order. But following their lunch with an aerial acrobatic class may not have been the greatest of ideas.(n)

programme.title: Coach Trip

programme.title: The Goldbergs
programme.desc: Beverly tries to find Pops a person to settle down with, and sets him up on a date with a woman called Sophia who seems to fit his demanding criteria. Meanwhile, Adam and Barry bond over their discovery of a new TV channel. Comedy, starring Wendi McLendon-Covey and Jeff Garlin.(n)

programme.title: The Goldbergs
programme.desc: Beverly confronts her husband after discovering her engagement ring is the same one Murray gave to his former fiancee. programme.title: The Goldbergs
programme.sub-title: Who Are You Going to Telephone?.
programme.desc: Adam abandons Pops to go trick-or-treating with some new friends, but he gets a shock when he discovers what they are really planning. Meanwhile, Beverly dons a costume so she can attend a teenager's Halloween party in secret and protect Barry from social humiliation. Comedy, starring Wendi McLendon-Covey and Jeff Garlin.(n)

programme.title: The Goldbergs
programme.sub-title: Call Me When You Get There.
programme.desc: Barry is thrilled by the freedom his new driving licence brings, until Beverly insists he sticks to her 10 rules of the road at all times. Meanwhile, Pops refuses to wear an emergency alert bracelet and is forced to call Adam when he suffers a fall. Comedy, starring Wendi McLendon-Covey and Jeff Garlin.(n)

programme.title: The Goldbergs
programme.desc: Beverly is determined to make friends with her reserved and softly spoken neighbours, the Kremps, so she bombards them with invitations to a barbecue. Meanwhile, Barry and Erica battle for control of the family's telephone line and beg their parents to get a second one installed. Comedy, starring Wendi McLendon-Covey and Jeff Garlin.(n)

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: The guys have fun at the expense of Penny's boyfriend Zack, but later try to make amends by enlisting his help with the New Year's costume competition at the comic-book store. Comedy, starring Kaley Cuoco and Simon Helberg.(n)

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: Leonard's ingenious idea for a new smartphone app puts pressure on his friendship with Sheldon, who vies with him for control of the project. Comedy, starring Johnny Galecki and Simon Helberg.(n)

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: Tension mounts when the gang attends a weekend science conference. Howard becomes argumentative after Bernadette runs into a former boyfriend, and the fallout causes chaos with the hotel room arrangements. Rick Fox guest stars, with Simon Helberg and Melissa Rauch.(n)

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: Sheldon agrees to participate in a series of short lectures at the university, but is worried the students dislike him. programme.title: The Big Bang Theory

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: Howard is torn between his relationship with Bernadette and pleasing his mother - and comes up with a solution that leaves everyone unsatisfied. Leonard rekindles his romance with Raj's sister Priya, while Amy uses Penny's emotions as the basis for a research project.(n)

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory

programme.title: Oceans
programme.desc: A team of marine experts reveal the hidden stories of our planet's last true wilderness - its oceans. Here, they investigate how the predatory Humboldt squid is invading the sea.(n)

programme.title: Dino Hunt
programme.desc: A team searches a 100-year-old dig site to find the remains of a 73-million-year-old armoured dinosaur, while a paleontologist couple tries to airlift a 4,000kg skeleton.(n)

programme.title: Extreme Fishing with Robson Green
programme.desc: The actor heads to California on the final leg of his seven-month adventure. He teams up with a guide for a fly-fishing experience at Mission Bay in San Diego, but instead of catching the trout to which Robson is accustomed, the duo go after blue sharks. He later returns to the location and succeeds in a night-time mission to land the giant Humboldt squid, but the following day spent on the Salton Sea lake proves less fruitful. He concludes his world tour by crossing the state line into Arizona, where he journeys down the Colorado River in search of rainbow trout.(n)

programme.title: Planet Earth
programme.desc: David Attenborough concludes the documentary series by focusing on the world's deserts. Cameras explore the dry Atacama of Chile, where guanacos survive by licking dew off cacti, and capture the rare sight of wild camels eating snow to stay hydrated on Mongolia's Gobi plains. In the rocky Namibian desert, elephants desperately search for food and lions wander the wilderness hunting oryx.(n)

programme.title: The Big Bang Machine
programme.desc: A 2008 documentary in which Professor Brian Cox visits Geneva to look around Cern's Large Hadron Collider - the world's most powerful particle collider - before the apparatus goes live. He explains why some scientists believe the experiment will be able to recreate the conditions that existed a billionth of a second after the Big Bang, and reveal some of the mysteries of creation.(n)

programme.title: Horizon
programme.sub-title: Horizon: What on Earth Is Wrong with Gravity?.
programme.desc: Physicist Dr Brian Cox tries to solve the centuries-old mystery of gravity. Unconventionally competing with Newton and Einstein, he starts in Texas, firing a laser at the moon, before moving on to a sat-nav in Denver and a Louisiana swamp. The real issues are in the area of quantum physics for, as he discovers, that is the science of absolutely everything.(n)

programme.title: Can We Make a Star on Earth
programme.desc: Professor Brian Cox embarks on a global tour to discover why, after decades of research, nuclear fusion has not yet become a feasible source of energy.(n)

programme.title: Horizon
programme.sub-title: Horizon: Swallowed by a Black Hole.
programme.desc: Documentary examining what would happen to a gas cloud that strayed within the gravitational reach of a supermassive black hole in the centre of the Milky Way. Across the globe, telescopes were trained on the heart of Earth's galaxy in the expectation of observing the cosmic spectacle for the first time in history.(n)

programme.title: Horizon
programme.sub-title: Horizon: Do You Know What Time It Is?.
programme.desc: Particle physicist Brian Cox investigates the concept of time, exploring its origins and its limits, and questioning whether travelling through it will ever be possible. He travels to Mexico, where the ancient Mayans once built temples dedicated to the subject, and dispels popular misconceptions about the length of the average day.(n)

programme.title: The Hitcher
programme.desc: Remake of the 1986 chiller about a couple who pick up a psychopathic hitchhiker(n)

programme.title: PCU
programme.desc: Actor Hart Bochner turns director in the satirical Animal House update P.C.U.. Per the title, the film takes place on the campus of a University where, thanks to militant dean Jessica Walter, Political Correctness has reached ridiculous proportions. A group of dorm-room cutups, wallowing in their uncorrectness, declares war on the uptight student activists who call the shots. Saturday Night Live's David Spade is among the leading players; while he's funnier here than in his costarring stints in Chris Farley's films, he doesn't have much to work with. The subject matter covered in P.C.U. has already been tackled, with far funnier results, on Bill Maher's cable-TV weekly Politically Incorrect(n)

programme.title: Spaceballs
programme.desc: Mel Brooks directs the cream of the Eighties comedy crop, including John Candy and Rick Moranis, in this hysterical parody of Star Wars. The Schwartz is most definitely with this one(n)

programme.title: The Perfect Guy
programme.desc: A successful lobbyist jumps into a new relationship shortly after breaking up with her noncommittal boyfriend. But when her ex resurfaces she soon realises that one of the two men is not who he appears to be(n)

programme.title: You Only Live Twice
programme.desc: When agent James Bond 007 is sent to investigate the disappearance of an American spacecraft, he discovers Blofeld, a megalomaniac bent on starting World War III. Operating from a spectacular base built into a volcano, Blofeld's radar-proof spacecraft has swallowed up American and Russian spaceships with the intention of causing the superpowers to blame each other and declare war(n)

programme.title: Close Encounters of the Third Kind
programme.desc: Steven Spielberg's classic sci-fi tale about two ordinary Midwesterners who are transformed by extraordinary chance meetings with visitors from outer space. Vilmos Zsigmond won an Oscar for his dazzling cinematography(n)

programme.title: Terms of Endearment
programme.desc: Shirley MacLaine and Debra Winger lead an all-star cast in James L. Brook's Oscar winning drama as a mother and daughter who find out just how difficult love can be(n)

programme.title: Town & Country
programme.desc: Porter Stoddard has never cheated, never even looked at another woman. Well, maybe once. But when family friend Mona sees her husband with another gal, Porter comforts her and it ends in bed. Woody Allen-style marital comedy drama(n)

programme.title: The Good Shepherd
programme.desc: Spy thriller charting the life of the man charged with heading the CIA's covert operations and uncovering a mole during the Bay of Pigs scandal, revealing how he changed from a once idealistic student into the untrusting overlord of American espionage(n)

programme.title: Live and Let Die
programme.desc: Investigating the deaths of three British agents, 007 encounters Mr. Big and Dr. Kananga, leaders of a vast crime network(n)

programme.title: Survivor's Remorse
programme.desc: Out of the Past. Cam and Reggie reconnect with a talented player whose career was sidetracked by prison; Cassie gets a home-purchasing budget from Reggie; and Cam contemplates slipping into a shoe-endorsement deal(n)

programme.title: Survivor's Remorse
programme.desc: Six. In the Season 1 finale, a former girlfriend reconnects with Reggie, leaving the family concerned(n)

programme.title: Top Secret!
programme.desc: An American rock and roll singer becomes involved in a Resistance plot to rescue a scientist imprisoned in East Germany(n)

programme.title: Freaks of Nature
programme.desc: A town full of humans, zombies, and vampires living in coexistence are thrust into an all-out war when aliens invade. Now, three teens (Nicholas Braun, Josh Fadem, and Mackenzie Davis) must defeat the newest visitors to restore the peace their town previously held. Robbie Pickering directs this horror comedy(n)

programme.title: There's Something About Mary
programme.desc: Ben Stiller plays high school geek Ted, invited to the prom by the gorgeous Mary. He can hardly believe his luck; but the night goes wrong when he arrives to pick up his date, and has a painful accident in the toilet, failing to stow his tackle before zipping up. Thirteen years later Ted still yearns for what might have been and hires private dick Pat Healy to find Mary. The detective succeeds but also falls for her and feeds Ted false information so he can keep her for himself. But a suspicious Ted takes matters into his own hands and finds he's in the middle of a love pentagon also involving an architect and an NFL quarterback. With the addition of gags involving a speed-freaked dog, Mary's use of what she believes is Ted's hair gel and a minstrel troupe who follow Ted around, the resulting comedy may not be subtle but is very funny(n)

programme.title: Truth
programme.desc: Docudrama about the controversial 2004 "60 Minutes" exposé on US President George W Bush's military service, and the fallout that producer Mary Mapes and anchor Dan Rather suffered after questions were raised about the validity of key documents in the report(n)

programme.title: Terms of Endearment
programme.desc: Shirley MacLaine and Debra Winger lead an all-star cast in James L. Brook's Oscar winning drama as a mother and daughter who find out just how difficult love can be(n)

programme.title: Thank You for Smoking
programme.desc: Aaron Eckhart lights up the screen in this hilarious satire about a gleefully amoral tobacco industry lobbyist who stops at nothing to put a positive spin on smoking as he clashes with a senator (William H. Macy), who wants to snuff out cigarettes. Maria Bello, Adam Brody, Sam Elliott, Katie Holmes, Rob Lowe. Directed by Jason Reitman(n)

programme.title: The Good Shepherd
programme.desc: Spy thriller charting the life of the man charged with heading the CIA's covert operations and uncovering a mole during the Bay of Pigs scandal, revealing how he changed from a once idealistic student into the untrusting overlord of American espionage(n)

programme.title: Die Another Day
programme.desc: Pierce Brosnan plays superspy James Bond for the fourth time in this action-packed adventure. This time out, 007 and an enigmatic woman named Jinx (Halle Berry) take on a madman with a satellite-laser weapon. Madonna sings the title song and has a cameo. Rick Yune(n)

programme.title: Live and Let Die
programme.desc: Investigating the deaths of three British agents, 007 encounters Mr. Big and Dr. Kananga, leaders of a vast crime network(n)

programme.title: Top Secret!
programme.desc: An American rock and roll singer becomes involved in a Resistance plot to rescue a scientist imprisoned in East Germany(n)

programme.title: National Treasure: Book of Secrets
programme.desc: Ben Gates is off on another thrilling treasure hunt in this action-packed sequel involving a missing page from John Wilkes Booth's diary, which leads to a globe-trotting race to find an ancient city of gold(n)

programme.title: My Best Friend's Wedding
programme.desc: Julianne Potter is horrified when she hears that her best friend, Michael O'Neal, is getting hitched; it was meant to be her! Installed as the maid of honour, she has just four days to convince him that Kimberly Wallace, who's beautiful, smart and loaded, isn't the girl for him. After Muriel's Wedding , PJ Hogan pulls off another successful nuptial comedy-drama(n)

programme.title: Die Another Day
programme.desc: Pierce Brosnan plays superspy James Bond for the fourth time in this action-packed adventure. This time out, 007 and an enigmatic woman named Jinx (Halle Berry) take on a madman with a satellite-laser weapon. Madonna sings the title song and has a cameo. Rick Yune(n)

programme.title: Red State
programme.desc: Kevin Smith steps his foot into horror territory with this politically tinged fright flick about a controversial Fred Phelps-ish reverend who brings his own brand of zealotry to a wayward group of teens(n)

programme.title: Pineapple Express
programme.desc: Critically acclaimed director David Gordon Green takes a break from the brooding drama that defined such early efforts as George Washington and Undertow for this action-flavored buddy comedy concerning two pot-smoking friends (Seth Rogen and James Franco) who unwittingly become involved with a vicious gang of drug dealers. Judd Apatow and Shauna Robertson produce a script co-penned by star Rogen and Evan Goldberg(n)

programme.title: Impostor
programme.desc: This long-delayed science fiction thriller from director Gary Fleder was actually filmed prior to his box-office hit Don't Say a Word (2001), which preceded it in theaters by several months. Based on a 1953 short story by Philip K. Dick, the film shares that schizophrenic author's long-running obsessions with concealed identity and humanity's potential inferiority to alternative life forms. Gary Sinise stars as Spencer John Olham, a respected government scientist in the year 2079 trying to devise a secret weapon that will help his fellow humans win a decade-long war with invading aliens that are cloning human subjects and using the replicas as walking time bombs. Suddenly, Olham is accused of being an alien spy and a nationwide manhunt to capture him ensues. With even his doctor wife (Madeleine Stowe) unsure that she can trust him, Olham must uncover the truth on his own, even as he's relentlessly pursued by Hathaway (Vincent D'Onofrio), a federal agent charged with destroying the clones. Imposter has a complicated history, originally produced in early 2000 as a 30-minute short to be included in an anthology entitled "The Light Years Trilogy," a project that never got off the ground. So impressed was Dimension Films with the completed piece, however, that the footage was incorporated into a new feature version. That film was then shuffled around the release schedule for more than a year as effects were completed, reshoots were ordered, and the film was recut for a PG-13 rating instead of its original R. The R-rated "director's cut" was later released on DVD(n)

programme.title: Jaws 2
programme.desc: Coastal resort-town police chief Brody (Roy Scheider) has reason to believe that a dangerous white shark is in the vicinity, and he wants the beaches closed. As in the original Jaws, the town council is more concerned with tourism than with the possibility of death and mayhem, which is exactly what results when they refuse to close the beaches. Unable to find a worthy shark hunter, Brody is forced to take on the nemesis himself in a thrilling finale in which nearly the entire waterfront is destroyed(n)

programme.title: Beverly Hills Cop II
programme.desc: Eddie Murphy returns as smooth Detroit street cop Axel Foley, who's back on the West Coast to track down a gunman and investigate a series of violent robberies(n)

programme.title: American Ninja
programme.desc: Kickup in the Philippines between martial-arts warriors and a U.S. soldier (Michael Dudikoff) and his Army buddies. Jackson: Steve James. Patricia: Judie Aronson. Hickock: Guich Koock. Shinyuki: John Fujioka. Ortega: Don Stewart(n)

programme.desc: Critically acclaimed director David Gordon Green takes a break from the brooding drama that defined such early efforts as George Washington and Undertow for this action-flavored buddy comedy concerning two pot-smoking friends (Seth Rogen and James Franco) who unwittingly become involved with a vicious gang of drug dealers. programme.title: The Day of the Jackal
programme.desc: Tense thriller about an assassination attempt on French President Charles de Gaulle. A reactionary paramilitary organisation hires the services of the world's most feared professional hitman, known only as the Jackal. While the Jackal starts to plan his audacious assassination, determined to pick off his target at the Liberation Day celebrations, French security forces learn of the plot and assign a senior detective to stop him(n)

programme.title: Beverly Hills Cop II
programme.desc: Eddie Murphy returns as smooth Detroit street cop Axel Foley, who's back on the West Coast to track down a gunman and investigate a series of violent robberies(n)

programme.title: Pineapple Express

Judd Apatow and Shauna Robertson produce a script co-penned by star Rogen and Evan Goldberg(n)

programme.title: Bandidas
programme.desc: Salma Hayek and Penélope Cruz star in this ripping Comedy-Western about two Mexican beauties who become outlaws to avenge the deaths of their fathers, who were murdered by a ruthless robber baron (Dwight Yoakam). Sam Shepard and Steve Zahn costar as members of their gang. Directed by Joachim Roenning and Espen Sandberg. Filmmaker Luc Besson co-wrote the script with Robert Mark Kamen. Denis Arndt, Audra Blaser, Karl Braun, Ismael Carlo, Carlos Cervantes(n)

programme.title: Kill the Irishman
programme.desc: Based on author Rick Porrello's book To Kill the Irishman: The War that Crippled the Mafia, director Jonathan Hensleigh's richly detailed biopic details the rise and fall of notorious Cleveland union rep Danny Greene (Ray Stevenson), who earned notoriety in the mid-'70s for his bold willingness to defy the Italian mob. Raised on the mean streets of Cleveland, Greene's tough reputation eventually lands him a contact with the local mob. Before long, the scrappy local has become a mafia enforcer, but after forming an alliance with notorious gangster John Nardi (Vincent D'Onofrio) and burning feared loan shark Shondor Birns (Christopher Walken), Greene starts to discover that he has the potential to become as powerful as any of his adversaries. Later, Greene develops a reputation as untouchable after surviving numerous assassination attempts, and dealing a devastating blow to organized-crime syndicates across the U.S(n)

programme.title: American Ninja
programme.desc: Kickup in the Philippines between martial-arts warriors and a U.S. soldier (Michael Dudikoff) and his Army buddies. Jackson: Steve James. Patricia: Judie Aronson. Hickock: Guich Koock. Shinyuki: John Fujioka. Ortega: Don Stewart(n)

programme.title: The Way of the Gun
programme.desc: Christopher McQuarrie's (writer of The Usual Suspects) directorial debut stars Benicio Del Toro and Ryan Phillippe as a couple of small time crooks who decide to kidnap and ransom Juliette Lewis, surrogate mother of wealthy Scott Wilson. They figure he'll pay big but what they don't know are his connections which includes veteran 'cleaner' (James Caan), who knows all about finding and dealing with 'problems'(n)

programme.title: The Great Escape
programme.desc: The star-studded WWII classic about a mass escape attempt by plucky Allied POWs from a supposedly escape-proof German camp. The escape committee's plan is to liberate hundreds of inmates and cause havoc throughout occupied territory. But their problems include concealing three tunnels from the guards and disposing of numerous tons of soil. Steve McQueen gets on his bike!(n)

programme.title: Flyboys
programme.desc: In WWI, before America joins the war, a group of young American men arrive in France to volunteer as fighter pilots. Under the tutelage of the harsh but fair Captain Thebault, they become aces in the sky, but it soon becomes clear that their life expectancy is short, and only a few of them will see the war through to its conclusion. War drama(n)

programme.title: Bandidas
programme.desc: Salma Hayek and Penélope Cruz star in this ripping Comedy-Western about two Mexican beauties who become outlaws to avenge the deaths of their fathers, who were murdered by a ruthless robber baron (Dwight Yoakam). Sam Shepard and Steve Zahn costar as members of their gang. Directed by Joachim Roenning and Espen Sandberg. Filmmaker Luc Besson co-wrote the script with Robert Mark Kamen. Denis Arndt, Audra Blaser, Karl Braun, Ismael Carlo, Carlos Cervantes(n)

programme.title: Windtalkers
programme.desc: Two US marines are assigned to guard Navajo radiomen that encrypt military messages in the native dialectal during the World War II(n)

programme.title: Patton
programme.desc: George C Scott, Karl Malden, Stephen Young, Michael Strong, Frank Latimore, James Edwards. Monumental biopic of the great but controversial US military general, George S Patton. The film follows his World War II career from his triumphs over Rommel in North Africa, through his demotion for mistreating a soldier under his command and up to the Battle of the Bulge. George C Scott's towering performance earned him an Oscar, which he refused to accept(n)

programme.desc: Buying goods from the comfort of home.(n)

programme.title: Monk
programme.desc: An astronaut baffles Adrian by seemingly achieving the impossible - murdering the author of a kiss-and-tell biography in her San Francisco home while simultaneously orbiting the Earth in a Nasa spacecraft. Guest starring Jeffrey Donovan (Burn Notice).(n)

programme.title: Monk
programme.sub-title: Mr Monk and the Candidate - Part Two.
programme.desc: Part two of two. The investigator looks into the murder of the mayoral candidate's bodyguard, and discovers the real identity of the intended target. Further analysis reveals how the case intertwines with the death of Nicole Vasques. Starring Tony Shalhoub, Bitty Schram and Ted Levine.(n)

programme.title: Monk
programme.desc: Bogus psychic Dolly Flint, who has been arrested three times by Stottlemeyer on fraud charges, helps Adrian stage a fraudulent seance with the aim of catching the killer of a former police commissioner's wife. Tony Shalhoub stars.(n)

programme.title: The Closer
programme.desc: Two police officers are killed in Mexico, and evidence suggests the prime suspect is an FBI informant, but with corruption rife among the force in Tijuana, Brenda does not know who to trust. Starring Kyra Sedgwick.(n)

programme.title: The Closer
programme.desc: Members of the squad realise a teenager who was recently killed by his own pipe bomb was not working alone. As they race against the clock to prevent a massacre, they risk paying the ultimate price for their work. Starring Kyra Sedgwick.(n)

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: A young Navy Seaman is found dead, with his eyes gouged out, after being involved in a car accident. Director Vance makes a rare return to field duty, pairing up with Gibbs to investigate when it becomes clear the killing seems to be connected to the case of Kip Klugman, a former NCIS agent he once locked up for stealing evidence. Starring Mark Harmon and Rocky Carroll.(n)

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: Abby visits a pharmaceutical lab to investigate a murder case, but when armed men storm the facility and hold everyone hostage, she is trapped within the building with no means of communicating with the outside world. Crime drama, starring Pauley Perrette, Mark Harmon and David McCallum.(n)

programme.title: Monk
programme.sub-title: Mr Monk Meets Dale the Whale.
programme.desc: An obese tycoon who once sued Adrian's wife for libel is accused of murdering a judge. A 911 call and the testimony of a 10-year-old boy identify him as the culprit, but nobody knows how the 57st man - who has not left his bed for 11 years - could have got out of the house to commit the crime. Guest starring Adam Arkin (Sons of Anarchy).(n)

programme.title: Monk
programme.sub-title: Mr Monk Goes to the Carnival.
programme.desc: Stottlemeyer rules that Adrian is still not ready to rejoin the force - then adds insult to injury by asking him to prove the innocence of his friend, a police officer accused of murdering a fellow passenger while riding on a fairground Ferris wheel. Tony Shalhoub stars.(n)

programme.title: The Closer
programme.desc: Brenda's parents visit, and pressure her into setting a date for the wedding. However, she cannot resist helping the squad investigate a murder, despite the presence of her guests. Starring Kyra Sedgwick.(n)

programme.title: The Closer
programme.desc: The body of an obese man who stole diamonds from his own shop is discovered in the boot of a car - and the team suspects his illusionist girlfriend might be involved in his death. Starring Kyra Sedgwick.(n)

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: The notorious Tri-State Sniper appears to have claimed another victim when a petty officer is shot dead in a crowded park. However, when the team discovers the killer in question was already in custody on the day of the shooting, it becomes clear a copy-cat is on the loose. As their investigation progresses, the agents learn the victim was recently found guilty of placing a camera in the female changing rooms of the USS Camden, earning himself plenty of enemies - but did any of them hate him enough to kill?.(n)

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: The team is called to investigate the murder of a retired US Navy lieutenant commander, and the inquiry forces Ducky to reveal he has been working as part of a secret society dedicated to solving cold cases. Starring Mark Harmon, David McCallum and Pauley Perrette.(n)

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: Torres discovers a witness in an NCIS case is wanted by US Immigration and Customs Enforcement, while Abby, Bishop and McGee hope to sublet Tony's apartment - by wooing his father.(n)

programme.title: Bull
programme.desc: Connections are drawn between a man facing vehicular manslaughter charges, and a corrupt state assemblyman who would greatly benefit from a guilty verdict.(n)

programme.title: Family Guy
programme.desc: Lois takes drastic action to save the life of Stewie's new best friend after his parents refuse treatment for his illness due to their religious beliefs. Meanwhile, Peter has a spiritual experience of his own. With the guest voice of Judy Greer (Archer).(n)

programme.title: Family Guy
programme.sub-title: Tom Tucker: The Man and His Dream.
programme.desc: Peter becomes newsreader Tom Tucker's agent as he pursues his dream of becoming a famous actor, and Chris begins dating a girl who looks a lot like a member of the Griffin household.(n)

programme.title: American Dad
programme.desc: Stan is delighted when Roger offers to help him open a restaurant, but their differences of opinion wreak havoc. Elsewhere, Steve sees an opportunity for romance when the new girl at school invites him over while her parents are out of town.(n)

programme.title: American Dad
programme.desc: A marriage counsellor hypnotises Francine and unwittingly revives her long-held dreams of becoming a comedienne. Meanwhile, Steve brings home a potential love interest for Klaus.(n)

programme.title: Family Guy
programme.desc: Quagmire takes parental responsibility for a baby who looks like him, but realises he may not be suitable for fatherhood, and Stewie clones himself so that he can have a personal assistant.(n)

programme.title: Family Guy
programme.desc: Peter and the gang interview potential friends to fill the vacancy left by Cleveland's departure, and Brian learns that Quagmire hates him - and only makes matters worse when he tries to find out why.(n)

programme.title: American Dad
programme.desc: Roger is offended by the family during his birthday celebrations, and vows to turn his life around - and take revenge. However, the alien takes things a step too far, causing the family to go on the run.(n)

programme.title: American Dad
programme.desc: In the 100th episode of the animated comedy, Stan and Francine try to stop Hayley from eloping with her boyfriend by offering a $50,000 reward to anyone stopping them. The entire town takes up the offer, including Steve and Roger under the alias Wheels and the Legman. Meanwhile, tragedy strikes at Langley Falls when 100 characters are killed off.(n)

programme.title: Family Guy
programme.desc: Meg starts a relationship with oversexed neighbour Quagmire after celebrating her 18th birthday, but Peter stops at nothing to end his daughter's fledgling romance.(n)

programme.title: Family Guy
programme.desc: Brian dates a blind girl, but is unimpressed when she reveals her dislike of dogs. Meanwhile, the Griffins have a new staircase installed when Peter decides to live upstairs permanently after a series of accidents.(n)

programme.title: American Dad
programme.desc: Stan creates a clone of Steve, and takes the opportunity to challenge Francine to a parenting competition in which they each raise one of the teenagers to determine who has the better child-rearing skills. Meanwhile, Roger tries to find a missing bride and groom in Thailand.(n)

programme.title: American Dad
programme.sub-title: The Best Little Horror House in Langley Falls.
programme.desc: A battle between Stan and Buckle breaks out when they try to outdo each other with their Halloween decorations. Animated comedy, with the voices of Seth MacFarlane and Scott Grimes.(n)

programme.title: Teleshopping
programme.desc: Buying goods from the comfort of home.(n)

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: An officer from Boynton Beach Police Department in Florida chases a man fleeing his car on foot, while one of his colleagues heads to the beach to intercept a boa constrictor.(n)

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: Officers from the Rio Grande City Customs and Border Protection in Texas engage in a sting operation to catch people illegally crossing the border.(n)

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: A Naval intelligence ensign is killed in an unusual car accident. Gibbs and his team are reunited with old friend Ned Dorneget, who is now working with NCIS cyber operations, and NSA attorney Jake Malloy to investigate the case, and discover a conspiracy involving terrorist recruitment on the internet.(n)

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: Special Agent Ned Dorneget of the NCIS cyber division joins the team to further their investigation into The Calling, the insidious terror network radicalising youngsters via the internet. When it emerges young suicide bomber Bradley was not, in fact, affiliated with The Calling, Gibbs and his colleagues realise they might be back to square-one. Determined to bring the organisation down, the agents pursue two new leads, an arms dealer who may be supplying The Calling with their signature German S-mines, and another boy given a deadly mission by the terrorists. Guest starring Matt Jones.(n)

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: The death of Special Agent Ned Dorneget hits the team hard, and when Gibbs receives a visit from his late colleague's mother - CIA Officer Joanna Teague - he must decide whether to let her help with the investigation into the Calling. Meanwhile, Gibbs hopes his young charge Luke, formerly one of the Calling's radicalised footsoldiers, might be key to bringing the organisation down. However, when the terrorists discover where their defecting comrade has taken refuge, the abduct him and flee to Iraq. The team follows hot on their heels, but it seems Luke's ties to the Calling might be stronger than anyone at NCIS ever anticipated. Naval crime drama, starring Mark Harmon, with guest Mimi Rogers.(n)

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: Gibbs fights for his life on board a US Navy hospital ship after being shot. Meanwhile, DiNozzo and Joanna Teague head for Shanghai, where they hope to take down the leaders of the terrorist group known as The Calling. Starring Mark Harmon, Michael Weatherly and Mimi Rogers.(n)

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: Gibbs throws himself back into his work following his near-death experience, updating his appearance and tackling a new risky case alongside DEA agent Luis Mitchell, who wants help bringing down a drugs cartel. Concerned about his colleague's apparent enthusiasm to re-enter the field, DiNozzo discovers Mitchell is the son of a former NCIS agent who gave his life trying to save Gibbs' late wife and daughter, and this attachment is causing Gibbs to break his own rule against personal involvement in a case. However, a significant danger is posed by Benson Long, the cartel's head, and Mitchell's top target.(n)

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: A petty officer is kidnapped, but manages to escape her captor, and the team discovers her abduction may be connected to her missing husband. Meanwhile, Abby knits everyone `gifts'.(n)

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: Torres discovers a witness in an NCIS case is wanted by US Immigration and Customs Enforcement, while Abby, Bishop and McGee hope to sublet Tony's apartment - by wooing his father.(n)

programme.title: The Closer
programme.desc: A girl is found dead in suspicious circumstances and a well-connected classmate, previously accused of raping her, immediately catches Brenda's attention.(n)

programme.title: The Closer
programme.desc: A reporter is the first person on the scene when a man wearing a surveillance wire in downtown Los Angeles is shot dead at point-blank range. As Brenda investigates the victim's connection to a drug ring, she and Fritz argue over who should take control of the case.(n)

programme.title: The Closer
programme.desc: Provenza and Flynn pose as hitmen to bring an attempted murder sting operation to a close, only to find all their evidence has been stolen while they stopped for lunch. Brenda is forced to free her suspect, and a furious Pope demands that Priory Homicide recover the missing items within 48 hours.(n)

programme.title: The Closer
programme.desc: Brenda struggles to decide how to handle the case of a missing boy - and as the investigation continues, suspicions arise as to whether he is a victim or a potential killer. Detective drama, starring Kyra Sedgwick.(n)

programme.title: The Closer
programme.desc: When Detective Sanchez's brother is murdered in a drive-by shooting, Brenda and the team try to discover who is responsible - while preventing their colleague from exacting personal revenge. However, the investigation is compromised when residents of the area where the crime was committed refuse to co-operate.(n)

programme.title: American Dad
programme.desc: Roger rediscovers one of his personas, Ricky Spanish, and soon remembers why he is the most hated person in Langley Falls. Meanwhile, an African child who Stan and Francine sponsored shows up on their doorstep.(n)

programme.title: American Dad
programme.desc: Stan is embarrassed by Steve's recreational activities, so he takes him to Mexico to teach him how to be more manly - but the plan backfires when they are kidnapped by members of a local drug cartel.(n)

programme.desc: Withdrawn, mute 10-year-old Philip is ignored by his parents and goes off to explore Dartmoor alone, where he meets a retired colonel who shares his knowledge of Devon's wildlife. Under the older man's nurturing tutelage, the boy begins to tame a wild white colt, but fate proffers a series of setbacks just as real progress is being made. programme.title: Thunderbirds
programme.desc: Devious master criminal The Hood infiltrates International Rescue's headquarters after sending the crew on a decoy mission as part of his plan to steal five advanced rescue vehicles. However, the youngest member of the Tracy family and his friends are still on the base, and it is down to them to save the day.
